meanings.sent1: Her conceitednesses made it hard for her to see the value in others.
meanings.sent2: His conceitednesses often led him to dismiss the opinions of those around him.
meanings.sent3: Despite his conceitednesses, he still managed to make friends with his charm.
meanings.sent4: The shadow of her conceitednesses loomed large over her relationships.
meanings.sent5: The conceitednesses in her voice was unmistakable as she bragged about her achievements.

meanings.definition: The state of being overly self-centered.
meanings.sent1: The conceitednesses of the child made it challenging for him to share his toys.
meanings.sent2: Her constant conceitednesses made it difficult for her to consider others' feelings.
meanings.sent3: Despite his conceitednesses, he still managed to make friends with his charm.
meanings.sent4: The shadow of her conceitednesses loomed large over her relationships.
meanings.sent5: The conceitednesses in her voice was unmistakable as she bragged about her achievements.

meanings.definition: An attitude of superiority towards others.
meanings.sent1: His conceitednesses often made others feel inferior in his presence.
meanings.sent2: The conceitednesses of the boss created a tense atmosphere in the office.
meanings.sent3: Despite his conceitednesses, he still managed to make friends with his charm.
meanings.sent4: The shadow of her conceitednesses loomed large over her relationships.
meanings.sent5: The conceitednesses in her voice was unmistakable as she bragged about her achievements.
